original_text: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, which Asenath the daughter of Potipherah priest of On bare unto him.
korean_text: 애굽 땅에서 온의 제사장 보디베라의 딸 아스낫이 요셉에게 낳은 므낫세와 에브라임이요

sentences.original_text: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt
which Asenath the daughter of Potipherah
priest of On bare unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 온 성의 제사장 아스낫이 그에게 낳았더라
